1514425537455820800.full_text: Four victims of the #NanjingMassacre passed away this year. The loss of the four survivors has reduced the number of registered survivors to 57. Memories of the Nanjing Massacre never belong only to the survivors but also need to be engraved on everyone's mind. https://t.co/2gDIzHSsrz

1513683604966047748.full_text: Wang Heng, one of #NanjingMassacre survivors, passed away at the age of 100 on April 7, reducing the number of survivors officially registered to 57, according to Memorial Hall of the Victims in Nanjing Massacre by Japanese Invaders. https://t.co/fGri6KXUNM

1514312540930543616.full_text: People mourn during the "lights out" ceremony at the Memorial Hall of the Victims of the #NanjingMassacre by Japanese Invaders in Nanjing, capital of East China's Jiangsu province on Wednesday. #NanjingMassacre victim Wang Heng passed away on April 7 at the age of 100, according to Memorial Hall of the Victims in Nanjing Massacre by Japanese Invaders. The number of registered victims of Nanjing Massacre is reduced to only 57.
